sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'
import Game from './game/Game'
import '../App.css'
import {
    Button,
    Grid,
    Header,
    Icon,
    Image,
    Menu,
    Segment,
    Sidebar
} from 'semantic-ui-react'

const App = () => {
    const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false) 
 
    return (
        <Sidebar.Pushable as={Segment}>
            <Sidebar
                as={Menu}
                animation='overlay'
                icon='labeled'
                inverted
                onHide={() => setVisible(false)}
                vertical
                visible={visible}
                width='thin'
            >
                {/* <Menu.Item as='a'>
                    <Icon name='align justify' />
                    Menu
                </Menu.Item> */}
                <Button className="ui black big button" onClick={() => setVisible(true)}>
                    <Icon name="align justify" />
                    Menu
                </Button>
                <Menu.Item as='a'>
                    <Icon name='gamepad' />
                    Game
                </Menu.Item>
                <Menu.Item as='a'>
                    Sign up / Sign in
                </Menu.Item>
            </Sidebar>

            <Sidebar.Pusher>
                
                <Grid columns={3}>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Button className="ui black big button" onClick={() => setVisible(true)}>
                            <Icon name="align justify"/>
                            Menu
                        </Button>
                        {/* <Menu.Item
                            className="ui black big button"
                            as='button'
                            onClick={() => setVisible(true)}
                        >
                            <Icon name='align justify' />
                        </Menu.Item> */}
                    </Grid.Column>
                    <Grid.Column>
                        <Game />
                    </Grid.Column>
                </Grid>
            </Sidebar.Pusher>
        </Sidebar.Pushable>
    )
}

export default App
